spoiler.header: Messages starting with {TAG} will be masked by default and revealed on hover
spoiler.autospoil_new_users:
Display all messages of 1st time chatters as spoilers
(useful if you play a spoiler-sensitive game)

command.title: Spoil someone's message
command.how_to: You can allow your mods to flag a message sent by another viewer as a spoiler by answering the message with the {CMD} command
